sqlMap.select:
SELECT db.name, dbx.accession, dbx.version, dbx_f.feature_id FROM feature_dbxref dbx_f LEFT JOIN dbxref dbx ON dbx.dbxref_id=dbx_f.dbxref_id LEFT JOIN db ON db.db_id=dbx.db_id LEFT JOIN feature f ON dbx_f.feature_id=f.feature_id
WHERE f.uniquename=#uniquename#
WHERE dbx_f.feature_id=$id$
ORDER BY f.type_id, uniquename
SELECT db_id FROM db WHERE name=#name#
SELECT dbxref_id FROM dbxref WHERE accession=#accession# AND db_id=$db_id$;
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM feature_dbxref WHERE dbxref_id= (SELECT dbxref_id FROM dbxref WHERE accession=#dbxref.accession# AND db_id=(SELECT db_id FROM db WHERE name=#dbxref.db.name#)) AND feature_id=$feature_id$
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO feature_dbxref (feature_id, dbxref_id, is_current) VALUES ($feature_id$, $dbxref_id$, $current$)
INSERT INTO dbxref ( db_id, accession ) VALUES ($db_id$, #accession#)
